name: Dale Jones
description: Life has many beautiful colours,I am a very loving,colourful and honest man.I am new to this and I am ready to meet someone ,a woman who is also ready for a greater friendship that will lead to a greater and more successful relationship.I lost my wife 5 years ago to ovarian cancer,I had up and downs and life experiences. I am still fit and working hard as a professional building and General contractor engineer. I am ready to be happy again in life and sharing the rest of my happy moments with you..Yes ..YOU!!..
